author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: New York food cart has a sign 'Free Food for Black People' | Daily Mail Online
text: comments A pop-up food cart with a sign reading 'black people only' appeared on a corner in the Bronx on Thursday morning to the outrage of some passersby. The cart was set up around 9am by a man and a woman, offering free doughnuts and juice, according to the New York Post . It also had three handmade signs reading 'Free Food For Black People,' which outraged some onlookers who are calling the stunt racist. A pop-up food cart, not pictured, with a sign reading 'black people only' appeared on a corner in the Bronx on Thursday morning to the outrage of some passersby RELATED ARTICLES
